title: Rainbow cupcakes
description: Simple but ever so pretty, these multi-coloured cupcakes are topped with sprinkles and a glacé cherry. Perfect for Red Nose Day bake sales.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need two 12-hole muffin tins and a piping bag fitted with a large star nozzle.
ingredients: 4 food colourings of your choice (such as red, yellow, green and blue)
